name: trackmap-app
description: TrackMap Application - Documentation and audit tools for GA4 tracking

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:trackdoc" "npm run dev:bff" "npm run dev:trackmapi"
scripts.build: npm run build:trackdoc && npm run build:bff
scripts.test: npm run test:trackdoc && npm run test:bff && npm run test:trackmapi
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/trackdoc && npm install && cd ../bff && npm install && cd ../trackmapi && npm install
